flawed_nl_solution:
He has 2000 pounds of fish because 10 x 200 = <<10*200=2000>>2000
He has enough for 80 customers because 2000 / 25 = <<2000/25=80>>80
21 customers go home without any fish because 100 - 80 = <<100-80=21>>21
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 21. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
